pathfinding.gridResolution.name: Pathfinding Grid Resolution
pathfinding.gridResolution.hint: Each grid square on a scene is divided into this number of squares across, the higher the resolution the more accurate the pathfinding, but it also takes longer.
pathfinding.drawGrid.name: Draw Pathfinding Grid
pathfinding.drawGrid.hint: Only for debugging, this will draw the pathfinding grid over each scene, buggy and slow.
